alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lamoille, northern Caledonia, Orleans and Essex Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eden, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Island Pond, Lyndon, Orleans, Derby Center, Greensboro, Charleston, Newport Town, Westmore, Orleans Village, Glover, Brownington, Albany, Burke, Brunswick, Sutton, Coventry, Barton, Troy and Averill. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 143 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern and northwestern Vermont.
